channel.title: Is this possible?
channel.description: I were wondring if it was a way to make items disappear when we try to wear them example: the id for a partyhat is: 1038 and the lended partyhat id is : 13531 is it any way to make it disappear when we try to wear the id : 13531 also the lended partyhat id? example: when someone click on the partyhat with the id 13531 it disappear and it come a messange like this: you should tell a staff member how you got this. And is it any tuts for it at all? just wondring because its no need to code it from scratch if its already a tut for it somewhere.

item.title: Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“Chaotic-land, post:10, topic:430893”][quote author=mironic link=topic=533571.msg3900685#msg3900685 date=1327731201]

I’ll might do it for you, if you send me your skype information or your teamviewer information.

Dont trust this dude.
[/quote]
True, he don’t have to trust me. However, im just trying to help.[/quote]
i remember someone with a similar or same name saying this to me. ended up messing with my client folder.
ruined Lolerscape. at the time it was the best 317. 30+ players (when having 15 players was a feat) … so yeah

dont trust anyone who wants to tv you with 3 lines of code.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @Chaotic-Madness Chaotic-Madness
item.description:
@Chaotic-Madness wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:2, topic:430893”] //add this in the lousy and retarded process method if (wornItem[slot] == 13531) { messageThis("You should tell a staff member how you got this."); setTheWornSlot(-1, slot); }

Why do the players have it in the first place? Why not just disallow regular players to wear the item?[/quote]

@Whackatre I was looking for something like this, thanks so much.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this possible?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

//add this in the lousy and retarded process method
if (wornItem[slot] == 13531)
{
     messageThis("You should tell a staff member how you got this.");
     setTheWornSlot(-1, slot);
}

Why do the players have it in the first place? Why not just disallow regular players to wear the item?

Read full topic

item.title: Is this possible?

@Chaotic-Madness wrote:

I were wondring if it was a way to make items disappear when we try to wear them
example: the id for a partyhat is: 1038
and the lended partyhat id is : 13531
is it any way to make it disappear when we try to wear the id : 13531 also the lended partyhat id?
example: when someone click on the partyhat with the id 13531 it disappear and it come a messange like this: you should tell a staff member how you got this.
And is it any tuts for it at all? just wondring because its no need to code it from scratch if its already a tut for it somewhere.
